comments.raw_text:
No idea what component this should be in but I've hit this a few times now, Nightly crashes, breakpad didn't catch it but I got a stack from the OSX reporter:

*** error for object 0x1410b0618: incorrect checksum for freed object - object was probably modified after being freed.
 

Thread 0 Crashed:  Dispatch queue: com.apple.main-thread
0   libSystem.B.dylib             	0x00007fff8478c5d6 __kill + 10
1   libSystem.B.dylib             	0x00007fff8482ccd6 abort + 83
2   libSystem.B.dylib             	0x00007fff8481b90d szone_error + 519
3   libSystem.B.dylib             	0x00007fff84747be6 tiny_free_list_remove_ptr + 158
4   libSystem.B.dylib             	0x00007fff847451ae szone_free_definite_size + 2005
5   XUL                           	0x000000010004fa0d nsStandardURL::Release() + 29
6   XUL                           	0x00000001009af409 XPCJSRuntime::GCCallback(JSContext*, JSGCStatus) + 1209
7   XUL                           	0x0000000100621068 DOMGCCallback(JSContext*, JSGCStatus) + 72
8   XUL                           	0x00000001010a48cc js_GC(JSContext*, JSCompartment*, JSGCInvocationKind) + 428
9   XUL                           	0x00000001009927f3 nsXPConnect::Collect() + 115
10  XUL                           	0x000000010098e90d nsXPConnect::GarbageCollect() + 13
11  XUL                           	0x0000000100e42bda nsTimerImpl::Fire() + 490
12  XUL                           	0x0000000100e42c98 nsTimerEvent::Run() + 56
13  XUL                           	0x0000000100e3f623 nsThread::ProcessNextEvent(int, int*) + 435
14  XUL                           	0x0000000100dfba8e NS_ProcessPendingEvents_P(nsIThread*, unsigned int) + 78
15  XUL                           	0x0000000100cd862d nsBaseAppShell::NativeEventCallback() + 93
16  XUL                           	0x0000000100ca39e7 nsAppShell::ProcessGeckoEvents(void*) + 423
17  com.apple.CoreFoundation      	0x00007fff83b80401 __CFRunLoopDoSources0 + 1361
18  com.apple.CoreFoundation      	0x00007fff83b7e5f9 __CFRunLoopRun + 873
19  com.apple.CoreFoundation      	0x00007fff83b7ddbf CFRunLoopRunSpecific + 575
20  com.apple.HIToolbox           	0x00007fff8408b7ee RunCurrentEventLoopInMode + 333
21  com.apple.HIToolbox           	0x00007fff8408b5f3 ReceiveNextEventCommon + 310
22  com.apple.HIToolbox           	0x00007fff8408b4ac BlockUntilNextEventMatchingListInMode + 59
23  com.apple.AppKit              	0x00007fff862f8e64 _DPSNextEvent + 718
24  com.apple.AppKit              	0x00007fff862f87a9 -[NSApplication nextEventMatchingMask:untilDate:inMode:dequeue:] + 155
25  com.apple.AppKit              	0x00007fff862be48b -[NSApplication run] + 395
26  XUL                           	0x0000000100ca337d nsAppShell::Run() + 45
27  XUL                           	0x0000000100b15684 nsAppStartup::Run() + 52
28  XUL                           	0x0000000100016b2f XRE_main + 12015
29  org.mozilla.nightly           	0x0000000100000af7 main + 231
30  org.mozilla.nightly           	0x0000000100000954 start + 52
comments.text:
No idea what component this should be in but I've hit this a few times now, Nightly crashes, breakpad didn't catch it but I got a stack from the OSX reporter:

*** error for object 0x1410b0618: incorrect checksum for freed object - object was probably modified after being freed.
